data.name: Skinwalker Hunt
data.detailed_description:
Skinwalker Hunt is a horror themed hunting game from the creator of Witch Hunt. Main focus of the game is on exploration, non-linearity, and atmosphere.

You play as a native american monster hunter, who will try to hunt down legendary creature called skinwalker in different parts of the world. You'll be able to find and use different tools and abilities to hunt and survive.

Warning: This is not a story driven game. Successful hunting requires patience and perseverance.

Key Features:

  • Large handcrafted environments
  • Replayability
  • Randomized placement of loot, npcs and interactive objects
  • Non-linear gameplay
  • No hand holding
  • Suspenseful atmosphere
  • Challenging difficulty

data.short_description: Skinwalker Hunt is a horror themed hunting game from the creator of Witch Hunt. Main focus of the game is on exploration, non-linearity, and atmosphere.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad, Intel Core 2 Duo e8500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 710 (1GB), Intel HD Graphics 630 or better.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 30 fps on 1280x720 resolution, using fastest quality setting. Nvidia GPU recommended!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500k
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 (3GB) or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 60+ fps on 1920x1080 resolution, using high graphics quality settings. Nvidia GPU recommended!
